name: Hardest The Voice Trivia Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Tweety Bird was voiced by a lot of different people. Who from the list is NOT one of those people?
questions.explanation:
Don Pardo.

	Mel Blanc was the voice from 1942-1989. Jeff Bergman was from 1990-1993. He also resumed being the voice in 2011. Bob Bergen started doing the voice in 1990. Joe Alaskey was the voice from 1995-2003. Samuel Vincent voiced Tweety only on "Baby Looney Tunes". The others voiced him in various movies.

questions.text: Jimmy Neutron was voiced by a girl.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Jimmy Neutron was voiced by Debi Derryberry. Derryberry was born September 22, 1967. She has been doing voices since 1986. She also goes by the name Dee Dee Green.

questions.text: Who voiced Buttercup from "The Powerpuff Girls"?
questions.explanation:
Elizabeth Daily.

	Daily voiced Buttercup from 1998-2005. She also voiced her in 2002 in "The Powerpuff Girls Movie". Daily also does live acting and in 2015 she was cast as Sex-Head in the Rob Zombie's "31".

questions.text: Who was the original voice of Smurfette?
questions.explanation:
Lucille Bliss.

	Bliss died from natural causes in 2012. Her first voice acting experience was as Anastasia in the Disney film "Cinderella".

questions.text: In the 1983-1985 version of "The Littles" who was the voice of Grandpa Little?
questions.explanation:
Alvy Moore.

	Moore was born on December 5, 1921 and died on May 4, 1997 from heart failure. He mostly did voice acting but he occasionally made TV appearances as guest stars.

questions.text: Let's turn to movies. Who was the voice of Elsa in "Frozen"?
questions.explanation:
Idina Menzel.

	Idina Menzel was born on May 30, 1970. While she started her career in 1991, it wasn't until 1996, when she played Maureen Johnson in the original cast of "Rent" on Broadway that she got her big break.

questions.text: Who was the voice of Hammy in the "Toy Story" movies?
questions.explanation:
John Ratzenberger.

	John Ratzenberger was born on April 6, 1947. He has been a voice in every Pixar movie made since 1995.

Ellen DeGeneres.

	Ellen DeGeneres was born in 1958. From 1994 to 1998 she had her own show called "Ellen". She also had her own talk show.

questions.text: Who was the voice of Snow White in the 1937 full length animated feature "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs"?
questions.explanation:
Adriana Caselotti.

	Caselotti was born on May 6, 1916. She died in 1997 from lung cancer. Caselotti was paid $970 for her role as Snow White. She was on contract with Disney even after "Snow White". Disney didn't want her to do any other voice work because he didn't want to lose the magic of "Snow White".

Robin Williams & Williams.

	Robin Williams was born July 26, 1951. He started working as a stand-up comic. IN 1978 he first played Mork on "Happy Days". He was such a hit that he got his own show "Mork and Mindy" which ran from 1978-1982. He made at least 58 movies either as a voice actor or a live action actor. Sadly, on August 11, 2014 Williams committed suicide by hanging. He had suffered with major depression  and had heard shortly before his death that he had Parkinson's Disease. While he is greatly missed, he brought attention to people that depression is real and it's important to get help.
